#summary El objeto screen representa la pantalla actual del cliente, como puede ser un monitor de computadora.
[ScreenObject English]

== Propiedades ==

  * [EsScreenAvailHeightProperty availHeight]
  * [EsScreenAvailLeftProperty availLeft]
  * [EsScreenAvailTopProperty availTop]
  * [EsScreenAvailWidthProperty availWidth]
  * [EsScreenBufferDepthProperty bufferDepth]
  * [EsScreenColorDepthProperty colorDepth]
  * [EsScreenDeviceXDPIProperty deviceXDPI]
  * [EsScreenDeviceYDPIProperty deviceYDPI]
  * [EsScreenFontSmoothingEnabledProperty fontSmoothingEnabled]
  * [EsScreenHeightProperty height]
  * [EsScreenLeftProperty left]
  * [EsScreenLogicalXDPIProperty logicalXDPI]
  * [EsScreenLogicalYDPIProperty logicalYDPI]
  * [EsScreenPixelDepthProperty pixelDepth]
  * [EsScreenTopProperty top]
  * [EsScreenUpdateIntervalProperty updateInterval]
  * [EsScreenWidthProperty width]
